issue.title: chkaja.com

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.48.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://img.chkaja.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
`chkaja.com` is a personal blog domain. And `img.chkaja.com` is an image hosting domain. Block rules in filter make website can't show properly.  #146588

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://img.chkaja.com/5b67ffb95281096e.png</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![](https://img.chkaja.com/a8ebca1aaca86f01.png)</details>



### Privacy

issue.title: netcine.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://netcine.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnetcine.to) ### Comment > O site netcine.to está dando uma bela rasteira nos desenvolvedores do adguard, a principio o player do vídeo não roda com a presença do plug-in (Firefox, Chrome, edge) mesmo desativado > outro ponto importante é que não é apenas em um navegador, são quase todos que dão suporte ao adguard. > não se trata de um bug do site, não se trata do bug de navegador, simplesmente usam uma falha.. se os outros sites começarem a usar isso, não vai servir pra nada um adblock. > > usando google translator: > > The site netcine.to is giving a beautiful creep in the developers of adguard, at first the video player does not run with the presence of the plug-in (Firefox, Chrome, edge) even disabled > another important point is that it is not only in one browser, it is almost all that support adguard. > it's not a site bug, it's not the browser bug, they just use a glitch. if the other sites start using this, it won't serve an adblock at all. > > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ocYHl2x.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7r6yQKl.png)

comment.body:
> Could you please add all these rules:
> 
> ```
> outlook.live.com#@?#div.customScrollBar > div > div > div > div > div > div:-abp-has(div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > i[data-icon-name="Delete"] + div[class])
> outlook.live.com#@?##app > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > div[class]:not(.ms-FocusZone):not([class^="screenReaderText"]) div[data-max-width][data-skip-link-name] > div[style^="padding-right:"] + div[tabindex] div.customScrollBar > div[class] > div[class]:not([id]):not([data-convid]):-abp-has(> div:not([class]) div[class] > div[style] + div.fbAdLink)
> outlook.live.com#@?##app > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > div[class]:not(.ms-FocusZone):not([class^="screenReaderText"]) div[data-max-width] + div[class]:-abp-has(> div[class] > div > div[id^="owaadbar"])
> outlook.live.com#@?#.customScrollBar[data-is-scrollable] > div[class] > div[class]:not([data-convid]):-abp-has(> div:not([id]):not([class]) > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > .fbAdLink)
> outlook.live.com#@?##app > .ms-Fabric > div[class] > div[class] > div[class]:-abp-has(> div > div > div[id^="owaadbar"])
> outlook.live.com#@?#div:-abp-has(> div > div.fbAdLink)
> ```
> 
> to user rules and then check if issue still occurs?
> 
> If messages will be displayed correctly, then please disable rules one by one until issue will start occurring again and please post the rule(s) which fixes problem.

Testing these, it looks like only this rule (the first one) is required to fix the problem:

`outlook.live.com#@?#div.customScrollBar > div > div > div > div > div > div:-abp-has(div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > div[class] > i[data-icon-name="Delete"] + div[class])`

The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

comment.body:
Реклама блокируется на этом сайте.
Для начала попробуйте:
1. Оставить включенным только этот список фильтров
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Annoyances
AdGuard Russian
```
2. Проверьте обновления фильтров в программе, оставаясь в этом окне примерно минуту.
3. Очистите данные Сафари, перезагрузите браузер
4. Откройте сайт.

Если проблема останется, нужно будет перезапустить контент блокеры (веб-расширения) в настройках Сафари, подождать в этом окне примерно минуту и открыть сайт в Сафари.
Если ничего из выше предложенного не поможет, напишите в техподдержку support@adguard.com.

issue.title: Ad leftovers on bilibili.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.48.2 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.bilibili.com ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Chinese filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. On www.bilibili.com, the current filter rules: ``` bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card > div.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]):upward(2) bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(> .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > [class^="bili-video-card__info--ad"]) bilibili.com#?#.eva-extension-feed-body > div:not([class], [id]):has(> .bili-video-card > .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > [class^="bili-video-card__info--ad"]) bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(> .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > .bili-video-card__info--creative-img) bilibili.com##.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href^="http"]:not([href*=".bilibili.com/"]) bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url*="gaoneng.bilibili.com"] bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url*="gaoneng.bilibili.com"] + .bili-video-card__info bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]) bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]) + .bili-video-card__info ``` from `AdGuard Chinese filter` produces ad leftovers occupying space (as in the screenshots 1,2). Also, rules 2-4 do not work with the new version of the website. This can be fixed by adding the following rule (with the previous ones removed). ``` bilibili.com##.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"]:upward(.bili-video-card) ``` 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: Previous rules enabled, DOM inspector on
Screenshot 2: Previous rules enabled, DOM inspector off
Screenshot 3: Suggested rule enabled, previous rule disabled, DOM inspector on
Screenshot 4: Suggested rule enabled, previous rule disabled, DOM inspector off
